comments:
I found that if I leave the Project Explorer in the "Projects" mode (vs. the "Working Sets" mode) when I shutdown eclipse, more often than not when I re-open eclipse, the Project Explorer does not render. The view contains the following exception. Once this happens, to get the view to render again, I had to close and re-open the view.

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException 
            at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(HashMap.java:782) 
            at java.util.HashMap$ValueIterator.next(HashMap.java:812)

            at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext.runInCurrentThread(ModalContext.java:346)

            at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.restoreState(Workbench.java:1512) 
            at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.access$12(Workbench.java:1491)

This is fixed for the WTP 1.0.1 02/06/06 committers build.
